cocosoR 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Introduction to CoCoSo Method

    Padronization of decision-making matriz by sum.

    standard_cocoso.Rd

    Padronization of decision-making matriz by sum.

    standard_cocoso(md_data)

    Arguments

    md_data

    Decision-making matrix.

    Value

    A Decision-making matrix normalize.

    Examples

    standard_cocoso(mtcars)
